mapper.insert: insert into huiyuan_activity( huiyuan_id, activity_id, volunteer_apply_status, created_time, updated_time) values ( #{huiyuanId}, #{activityId}, #{volunteerApplyStatus}, now(), now() ) ON DUPLICATE key update status = 1, updated_time=now(), volunteer_apply_status=#{volunteerApplyStatus}
mapper.update: update huiyuan_activity set attend_status=1, updated_time=now() where huiyuan_id=#{huiyuanId} and activity_id=#{activityId} and status=1
mapper.select: select ha.*,activity.start_time from huiyuan_activity ha left join activity on activity.id=ha.activity_id where huiyuan_id=#{huiyuanId} and activity_id=#{activityId} and ha.status=1
